name: SOUND'S MART
short_des: MERN Stack project. It is role base permission website
des: SOUND'S MART is my 12th Assignment Project. My project topics name is Headphone. To make this project, I used React js, Nodejs, Express js, MongoDB, Google Firebase web applications. SOUND'S MART is Full Stack based website with user role based. This site's dashboard worked for 3 types of user role - admin, seller and buyer. React js application is easy to use for it's reusable UI components and secure access. I like it very much because of it's handling simplicity, also my site work properly with super fast speed. Also anyone can route easily form one page to another. Link routed properly.To make this project I faced some challenges to myself and enjoyed it more. Challenges always attracted to Me!
features: Made admin user, seller user, buyer user
Made dynamic route and set in navbar
Made server site and created json data file
Data inserted in MongoDB and data retrive to client site
Loaded API and display data in dynamic routes
Created context API
Integrated firebase Auth in my client site
Created private route for my review, Add Services pages and logout option
Set jwt token system
Protected API and Secret key with Environment variable
Using React daisy UI,React icon, React Router Dom
UI responsive for any device and more...

name: RealEstate Genius
short_des: The aim of RealEstateGenius is to revolutionize the property valuation process using the power of open AI. Our project aims to provide an efficient and accurate solution for generating property descriptions, images, and valuations.
des: The aim of RealEstateGenius is to revolutionize the property valuation process using the power of open AI. Our project aims to provide an efficient and accurate solution for generating property descriptions, images, and valuations. By leveraging cutting-edge AI technology, we aim to simplify and streamline the property valuation process, saving time and effort for real estate professionals and individuals. With our user-friendly interface and seamless integration of OpenAI, we strive to empower users with valuable property insights, generate visually captivating descriptions, and enable them to make informed decisions in the real estate market.
features: Property description and image generation with open AI
Social media poster generation with open AI
Generated Property & Poster PDF download
Google SignIn SignUp with Firebase
Property Listings
Property Details
Mailchimp Subscriptions
Blog and Articles
FAQ (optional)
Social Media Integration
Mobile Responsiveness
Testimonials
Toast messages

name: PORTABLE CHARGER
short_des: The Portable Charger Landing Page is a professionally designed and responsive web page that effectively markets portable charger products to a wide range of users. Its modern design, user-friendly interface, and strategic features make it a valuable tool for driving brand awareness and customer engagement in the competitive market of portable charging solutions. Whether accessed on a desktop computer, tablet, or mobile phone, this landing page ensures a seamless and visually pleasing experience for all users.
des: The Portable Charger Landing Page is a responsive HTML and CSS web page designed to showcase and promote portable charger products. This sleek and user-friendly web page provides an engaging and informative experience for users across various devices, ensuring a seamless browsing experience whether they are using a desktop computer, tablet, or mobile phone. Responsive Design: The landing page has been meticulously crafted to adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions, guaranteeing an optimal viewing experience for users on desktops, laptops, tablets, and smartphones. Modern and Attractive Layout: The design of the landing page is not only functional but also visually appealing. It incorporates modern design elements, including a clean and intuitive navigation menu, eye-catching images, and a balanced color scheme that complements the product's aesthetics. Product Showcase: The central focus of the landing page is to showcase the portable charger products. High-quality images and detailed product descriptions are provided, allowing users to explore the features, specifications, and benefits of the chargers. Call to Action (CTA): To encourage user interaction, strategically placed CTAs prompt visitors to take action, such as making a purchase, signing up for a newsletter, or contacting customer support. Informational Sections: Beyond the product showcase, the landing page includes informative sections that highlight the advantages of portable chargers, explain how they work, and offer tips on selecting the right charger for specific needs. Social Media Integration: Links to the company's social media profiles enable users to stay connected and updated with the latest news and promotions.Newsletter Signup: A newsletter signup form can be included to collect leads and expand the customer base. Footer: The footer of the page typically contains important links, such as privacy policies, terms of service, and copyright information.
features: Increase brand visibility and awareness.
Drive traffic to the product pages
Encourage user engagement and interaction
Generate leads and potential customers
Provide an exceptional user experience across all devices

name: IMAGE SEARCH APP
short_des: The Image Search App serves as a platform for users to explore and discover a diverse range of images.
des: The Image Search App is a web application designed to allow users to explore and discover a wide variety of images. Users can initiate searches by entering keywords, and the app fetches relevant images from an external source, such as Unsplash, using their API. The search results are displayed in an organized grid, with each image accompanied by a brief description and a link to the source. The app incorporates responsive design principles, adapting its layout for various screen sizes. Users can easily navigate through the displayed images and load additional results with the 'Show More' button. Overall, the Image Search App provides a user-friendly and visually engaging experience for exploring and discovering images based on user interests.
features: Users can initiate searches by entering specific keywords relevant to their interests
The app utilizes external APIs, such as Unsplash, to fetch and display relevant images based on user queries
Search results are presented in a well-organized grid format for easy visual exploration
The app incorporates responsive design principles, ensuring an optimal user experience across various device screen sizes
The app includes a 'Show More' button that allows users to load additional search results for a more extensive image exploration

name: CHOICE TOP PLAYERS
short_des: Select Top Players is Document Object Model based Website. Here I implemented querySelector, querySelectorAll, getElementById, getElementsByClassName, addEventListener,Event bubble.
des: CHOICE TOP PLAYERS is my Document Object Model base project. I made a Side Board in this project where had 2 parts with players and Budget calculation. If you click card Select button, player name will be added in Selected - V fields. You can select only 5 players because of I kept limited this amount. Then you input your expenses in budgets different fields. Finally you will get your total expenses if you click Calculate Total Button.
features: Here I used HTML for markup, CSS for style and javascript for manipulation
I made card with image, title, and select button
I integrated HTML with javascript with getElementById. Also sometimes used querySelector and querySelectorAll
Created button with event handler
I use onClick javaScript event for user interacts with Choice Top Players Site
